parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10000**.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: UuidList
parameters.description:
The UUIDs of the servers.

>  You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~DescribeCloudCenterInstances~~) operation to query the UUIDs of servers.
